short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Make ipynb files wider in GitHub

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension makes Jupyter / ipython notebooks wider in GitHub. It is one line of c. In GitHub, which is a code review website, it is hard to see jupyter notebooks (which are a python-based code display and data analysis tool), because they are too thin and the text is cut off. I use this extension every day to make them wider which make code reviews easier since the entirety of the notebook is viewable on GitHub.
